items.content_html: Tired of manually renaming images when saving them from the web? Save Image with Description is your solution! This lightweight Chrome extension automatically extracts descriptive text—such as captions, alt text, or nearby descriptions—from images on any webpage and uses it to name your downloaded file.
items.title: pranjalmahna/Save-Image-With-Description: Tired of manually renaming images when saving them from the web? Save Image with Description is your solution! This lightweight Chrome extension automatically extracts descriptive text—such as captions, alt text, or nearby descriptions—from images on any webpage and uses it to name your downloaded file.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
